traits.name: Amphibious
entries: The dragon can breathe air and water.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The dragon makes three attacks: one with its bite and two with its claws.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) poison damage.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Poison Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The dragon exhales poisonous gas in a 30-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 14 Constitution saving throw, taking 42 (12d6 damage) poison damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.
